Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add custom equipment types, PDF support, and purple Orion branding

- Added predefined equipment types: VDX, VRX, Antena, Switch, TRC, TRM, intel, jetson, Wi-FI
- Implemented custom equipment type input with localStorage memory
- Custom types are saved and offered in datalist for future use
- Enhanced PDF document support with accept filter and PDF-specific icon
- Updated "Orion" branding to purple color (#a855f7) throughout the application
- Filter dropdown now dynamically populates with all equipment types in use
- Updated OPIS_APLIKACIJE.txt with version 1.1 changes and features
